Reviews.Content: The room was very spacious and nicely appointed. This is not a sterile clean line hotel. The rooms are glam and colorful. My room was done in browns and darker colors. There were floor to ceiling windows but some parts of the room were dark. It wasn't a deal breaker at all because the well appointed kitchen (fridge, microwave, dishes) and the washer and dryer and nice toiletries made up for the dark room. I would bring my boyfriend and hang out at the clubs (from my room I could hear the pounding music all night ong). Not really but I am just saying that this wasn't a quiet retreat like location.

Reviews.Title: “BAD NEWS BILLING”
Reviews.Author: kate272
Reviews.Content: This hotel charged my credit card $410 the day before my arrival and an additional $110 the day following my departure. THIS WAS FOR A ONE NIGHT STAY!! The amount that was supposed to be charged was $285. Needless to say I will NOT be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Redbury will not let you down”
Reviews.Author: Marisa5
Reviews.Content: Not only was the location great, the rooms were very hip and well appointed w all you really need, the service was very personable, the restaurant was bustling with people and had a great energy, and everyone around you was having fun and enjoying their night out. If you are debating on staying at the W or the Redbury, I would opt for the Redbury. Your experience will be more unique and I promise you will tell your friends about it.

Reviews.Title: “Simply Beautiful”
Reviews.Author: mountainsandbeaches2
Reviews.Content: This is simply a beautiful hotel. The staff is excellent, always courteous, friendly and extremely helpful. If you want to be close to the attractions on Hollywood Blvd, this is the place to stay. I was given a complimentary upgrade to a Vine suite; a perfect view of the Capitol records building and the Hollywood sign. You can't go wrong staying at the Redbury. Thank you to all for making my stay a memorable one.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing TRENDY HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: PlusModelChic
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at numerous hotels in Hollywood, but this was by far the best hotel in Hollywood. The room was very spacious (800 square feet) compared to about 400 square feet at other hotels. The rooms decor was gorgeous, the TV has REAL cable, great views, nice size balcony with drapes for privacy, in the middle of everything, and very polite / amazing professional staff (bellman, valet, front desk, concierge). This is my new favorite Hotel and will be staying there many more times to come!

Reviews.Title: “spacious & clean”
Reviews.Author: GOTHICRASTA
Reviews.Content: what i love most with this place is the hospitality of the staff.. I give them 5 stars for that I love the room , the bed , the TV, the shower, mini kitchen, the location .. everything its a mix of modern chic vintage boho whatever you may call that .. I love anything vintage looking so i super loved the turntable it will let you go back in time. This Hotel is a work of art.. Highly recommended! oh! the only problem was i had the hardest time finding the switch for turning on/off certain lights or maybe it was just me.. but yeah they should put a label on it .. but aside from that it was fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Great New Property - Huge Rooms, Near all of the action”
Reviews.Author: Playahome2010
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last Friday night...staff was friendly and very attentive. My wife and I loved the record player in the room (thought it was kitschy at first...but fun to listen to music in an old-school raw format) and being able to hang out on the balcony watching the scene. Have a full kitchen and seating area made the place a great place to hang out before dinner and relaxing in the morning. Able to walk to several bars at night and Cleo (the restaurant) was amazing. Despite the crazy hollywood scene, we got a good night's rest - the room was very quiet and bed was very comfortable. Definitely would recommend this property.

Reviews.Title: “A hotel done right!”
Reviews.Author: ktholmes
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough good things about this hotel! I travel for my work and am in hotels all year long, and this hotel is one of my top picks! The location is ideal; near local hangouts, great restaurants, and classic Hollywood must-sees. The decor is totally unique, well thought out and comfortable. The rooms are large, the staff friendly and down to earth. The Redbury is the classic marriage of new and old. Vintage and modern. Exclusivity and California cool.

HotelInfo.Name: The Redbury @ Hollywood and Vine
HotelInfo.Address: 1717 Vine Street, Los Angeles, CA 90028
